text: Eshton was the father of Beth Rapha, Paseah, and Tehinnah, the father4:12. “Father”: probably in the sense of “founder.” Ir Nahash means “city of the serpent.” of Ir Nahash. These were the men of Recah.4:12. “Recah.” Some manuscripts read “Recab,” in which case this would refer to those mentioned in 2:55.
